Name: Capto: Capture Your Gameplay
About the game: Capto is a powerful screen capture, and recording app suite that’s perfect for capturing gaming actions live and creating informative gaming tutorials. You can Instantly screen record your gaming live and show off your mastery by sharing it at the press of a button on YouTube and other social platforms. The app has a broad range of video and image capturing & editing tools and a well designed organizer to manage these captures into different folders. You can instantly share your creation on YouTube, Dropbox, Tumblr, and FTP/SFTP servers as well. Your imagination combined with rich set of editing tools can be effectively used for creating informative gaming Tutorials, Vlogs, and other Educational videos. Key features that will help you to record and edit your gaming videos to the next level • Fullscreen and Region Recording |Timed Recording • Video Recording | Tutorial Video Making • Video Editing | Annotations • Audio Recording & Editing | Individual Track Control • Image Editing | Annotations • Smart Collection Folder | File information • Online Platform Sharing | Server Sharing
